about_the_game:
Giant Bosses: Fight bosses so large they become parts of the stage when knocked down


Over-the-shoulder Combat: When engaged in combat, time slows down as you take control of the unit's actions. Master each character's unique weapons and attack methods to deal more damage to your enemies and carve a path to victory.


Active Time Strategy: Experience a new kind of tactical gameplay where every unit can make their move in realtime, provided they have the stamina for it. Manage your allies stamina to keep one step ahead of your opponent at all times. Moving at the right time can even trigger Dodge Rolls!


Crafting: Collect materials scattered throughout the environment to craft better weapons and equipment for your units, granting them additional attack power, defense, movement range, etc. But beware, resources are limited and must be used wisely across your party.


For ages the Tyrant God contained his twisted creations to the Lost Continent across the western waters and humanity rested easy.
When the fiends started washing ashore however, the rise of a new Saint who would vanquish the Tyrant once again was inevitable. Or so the prophecies foretold...
For what was left unsaid was that the Saint's rise would be shortly followed by his demise, and with it, so too humanity's hope for salvation would be lost.
In this doomed world, players take the role of Lady Alanna Aelfrum, sister of the dead saint, as she must now make her way back from the Lost Continent and oppose the Tyrant's hordes in order to keep what's left of her family safe. Command allies across the battlefield in turn-based tactical gameplay, but be prepared to get your hands dirty in over-the-shoulder combat as you slash, shoot, pierce and cast spells at your foes in real time action.
